channel.title: When I upload client.jar to website and got white screen how i fix?
channel.description: When I upload client.jar to website and got white screen how i fix?

item.title: When I upload client.jar to website and got white screen how i fix?
item.dc:creator: @vengscape vengscape
item.description:
@vengscape wrote:

Well firstly you have a series of problems,

  1. You havnt jarred/signed it properly
  2. One of the clients java files may be wrong or corrupt
  3. You havnt applied an auto cache downloader

Try following this tut m8 and hopefully it will work:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,336494.0.html

Good luck and hope i helped

Read full topic
